summary: Phase 3 blocked by two issues: (1) Pre-existing build errors from split-at tactic incompatibility with Lean 4.27.0-rc1, (2) Mathematical issue discovered - maximal_tcs_is_mcs lemma appears unprovable as stated because henkinStep does not add negations when rejecting packages.

artifacts.summary: Implementation plan with Phases 1-2 completed, Phase 3 blocked
Implementation summary documenting Phase 3 blockers and mathematical issues

partial_progress.blocker: Two blockers: (1) Build errors - split-at tactic incompatible with temporalWitnessChain unfolding in Lean 4.27.0-rc1, (2) Mathematical - maximal_tcs_is_mcs is unprovable without modifying henkinStep to add negations when rejecting packages

review_reason: Mathematical issue discovered: The lemma maximal_tcs_is_mcs may be false as stated. The Henkin construction adds packages when consistent but does NOT add negations when rejecting. This allows scenarios where M is maximal in TCS but not an MCS. Recommended fix: modify henkinStep to add neg(phi) when temporalPackage(phi) is inconsistent with S.

errors.message: TemporalLindenbaum.lean does not compile due to split-at tactic incompatibility in Lean 4.27.0-rc1. The temporalWitnessChain function unfolds with have-bindings that split cannot handle.
errors.recommendation: Create task to fix split-at issues by converting to explicit cases patterns

errors.message: maximal_tcs_is_mcs lemma appears mathematically false. Counterexample: M maximal in TCS with F(p) not in M, p not in M, but M union {F(p)} consistent (package rejection only means M union package is inconsistent). In this case M is not MCS.
errors.recommendation: Modify henkinStep to add neg(phi) when temporalPackage(phi) is inconsistent, making Henkin limit temporally complete

completion_data.completion_summary: Phases 1-2 completed (temporal closure infrastructure, base saturation assumptions). Phase 3 blocked by mathematical issue: maximal_tcs_is_mcs lemma is unprovable without modifying henkinStep to add negations when rejecting packages.
